name: Wildlife Park 2 - Horses
description: Horsesimulation with 16 breeds of horses and varied missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3000 MB available space Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park Retail Versions

reviews.review_text: Created a horse named spirit legs accidentally made a very deep hole and spirit legs jumped in... R.I.P Spirit legs forever in our hearts   10/10
Sold my horses within 2 minutes of playing the game.   10/10 would sell again

awful its not what the picture just show they focus on horses but incomplete honesty its like building a zoo and is very difficult to figue out i honestly think that you shouldnt waste your money on it but how ever if you know what zoo tycoon is than you may enjoy this but i also enjoyed zoo tycook and this didnt even slightly catch my interst
